Key Match Events: Justyn-Henry Malloy's eighth-inning sacrifice fly helped the Tigers rally from a 3-0 deficit.
The Rays took a 2-0 lead in the third inning with singles and a two-run single by Brandon Lowe.
Casey Mize's wild pitch allowed the Rays to score in the fifth inning.
Post-Match Reflections: Rays manager Kevin Cash noted the Tigers' momentum and the Rays' elimination from playoff contention.
Tigers manager A.J. Hinch emphasized the team's belief in their ability to achieve more.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Rays fell two games behind the Red Sox in the AL East.
The Tigers are tied for the second wildcard spot and close to securing a playoff berth.
